name: Roasted Pumpkin Seeds
description: Ever wonder what to do with all those pumpkin seeds? Try this delicious option.
preparation: Toss pumpkin seeds with oil and seasoning.
Spread in a single layer on stacked Multi Purpose Tray.
Cook on high for about 2–4 minutes, until dry and golden.
Toss clean, dry pumpkin seeds with oil and seasoning.
Spread in a single layer on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner
Bake for about 30 minutes, until dry and golden, stirring occasionally.
tips: May be stored in an airtight container for up to 2 days.
